channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FELIX-346] Bundle.getHeaders() fails with NullPointerException
item.description:
It seems the code assumes the locale != null, I think the local can be legally null

java.lang.NullPointerException

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I have modified the code to use the default locale if null is specified. Peter, please close this bug if the issue is resolved. Thanks.
